problem.p: A checkboxes problem presents checkbox buttons for student input. Students can select more than one option presented.
Here is what the markdown language looks like:

pre.code:
>>Select the answer that matches<<
[x] correct [ ] incorrect [x] correct

problem.p: To create the checkboxes, you add a left bracket [ and a right bracket]. Note that for this kind of problem, you can have more than one answer option be correct. Place a small x in any of the answer options that should be marked as correct.
